slides.title: Ratio Basics
slides.content:
**Ratio** compares two quantities.

**Format:** a:b or a/b

**Example:** 2:3 means 2 parts to 3 parts

slides.title: Proportion
slides.content:
**Proportion:** Equality of two ratios

**Format:** a:b = c:d

**Product Rule:** a×d = b×c

**Example:** 2:3 = 4:6 (2×6 = 3×4 = 12)

slides.title: Types of Ratios
slides.content:
**Simple Ratio:** 2:3
**Compound Ratio:** (a:b)×(c:d) = ac:bd
**Duplicate Ratio:** a²:b²
**Triplicate Ratio:** a³:b³
